name: A Spooky 2D Escape
description:
WARNING: There seems to be an issue/bug with CHROME and the lighting engine currently (didn't know before starting), if you're unable to get past the splash screen please use FIREFOX to play.
Alternatively I have created a Windows, Linux and MacOS build which can be found below in the DOWNLOAD section.

A Spooky 2D Escape is a submission for TheoClarke's s Spooky 2D Jam (#S2DJ2020). In this short spooky game, you play as ??? a purple slime cube thing that has recently escaped their cell.

Each level on your short journey you become more cynical at the rushed level design and poor excuses for traps and enemies.

Will you make it to the end, and if you do who or what will you find?
-----

Game and all Assets (excluding the background music) created within the time frame by a single person.

Background Music - Underworld by Myuu, please check out their other music here.

Game Engine used was GDevelop, a simple yet robust 2D engine that is accessible to all skill levels. Check out the website here and the discord here.

If you have enjoyed this game, please vote for this game at https://itch.io/jam/spooky-2d-jam-2020/entries this is my first Game Jam and it has been quite the experience :D
